questions.question_text: Jay Swāminārāyaṇ, jay Akşharpurushottam, Aksharpurushottam jay, darshan ________... Jay Swāminārāyaṇ...
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Ārti is 'sarvottam'.

questions.question_text: Mukta anant supūjit, sundar ________, Sarvoparī karuņākar, mānav tanudhāram... Jay Swāminārāyaṇ 1
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Ārti is 'sākāram'.

questions.question_text: Purushottam Parabrahma, Shrīhari Sahajānand, Aksharbrahma anādi, ________... Jay Swāminārāyaṇ... 2
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Ārti is 'Guņātītānand'.

questions.question_text: Prakat sadā sarvakartā, param muktidātā, Dharma ekāntik sthāpak, ________..... Jay Swāminārāyan...3
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Ārti is 'bhakti paritrātā'.

questions.question_text: Dāsbhāv divyatā sah, brahmarūpe prīti, Suhrudbhāv alaukik, ________... Jay Swāminārāyan... 4
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Ārti is 'sthāpit shubh rīti'.

questions.question_text: Dhanya dhanya mam jīvan, tav sharane sufalam, Yagnapurush pravartit ________ sukhadam... Jay Swāminārayan....5
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Ārti is 'siddhāntam'.

questions.question_text: Antaryāmi parātparam hita-karam, sarvoparī Shri Hari, Sākāram Parabrahma sarva-sharaņam, kartā ________;
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Asthak is 'dayā-sāgaram'.

questions.question_text: Ārādhyam mama işhţadev prakaţam, sarvāvatārī Prabhu, Vande dukha-haram sadā sukha-karam, ________. 1
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Asthak is 'Shri Swāminārāyaņam'.

questions.question_text: Sākşhād Aksharadhāma divya paramam, sevāratam mūrtimān, Sarvādhāra sadā svaroma-vivare, ________;
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Asthak is 'brahmānda-koţī-dharam'.

questions.question_text: Bhakti dhyāna kathā sadaiva karaņam, brahma-sthiti-dāyakam, Vande Aksharabrahma pāda-kamalam, ________. 2
questions.explanation: The missing word in the Asthak is 'Guņātītānandanam'.
